title.rendered: World Cup Follow Team USA Packages

content.rendered:
Follow Team USA with Your Bespoke World Cup Package

It’s one thing to experience the thrill of the World Cup live, but to see your own team play in the biggest tournament in the world, there’s simply nothing better. Follow Team USA throughout the tournament to witness every minute of their World Cup pursuit. Your package includes everything you need to follow your team including accommodations, transfers, and onsite hosts. We’ve worked out all the details so you don’t have to!
